statements: UPDATE ImageTransformationMatrices SET matrix_1 = 2.0, matrix_2 = 1.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ImageTransformationMatrices SET matrix_4 = 3.0, matrix_3 = 2.5 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ImageTransformationMatrices SET matrix_1 = 1.5, matrix_2 = 2.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ImageTransformationMatrices SET matrix_3 = 3.5, matrix_4 = 4.5 WHERE matrix_1 < 2.0;
UPDATE ImageMatrices SET transformation_matrix = '[1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1]' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ImageTransformations SET transformation_details = '{"rotation_angle": 90, "scale_factor": 2}' WHERE image_id = 2;
UPDATE ImageMatrices SET transformation_matrix = '[1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1]' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE ImageTransformations SET transformation_details = '{"rotate": 90, "scale": 1.5, "translate": [20, 30]}' WHERE image_id = 2 AND transformation_type = 'rotation'
UPDATE image_matrices SET matrix_values = '{"test": 123}' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE ImageMatrices SET matrix_name = 'NewMatrixName' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ImageMetadata SET image_size = 500, image_format = 'PNG' WHERE image_id = 3;
UPDATE ImageMatrices SET matrix_name='NewMatrix' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ImageMetadata SET image_format='PNG', created_at=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE image_id=5;
UPDATE image_metadata SET image_name = 'New Image Name' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE image_metadata SET image_path = '/new/image/path' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE perspective_corrections SET correction_matrix = '[[1, 0, 0], [0, 1, 0], [0.1, 0.2, 1]]' WHERE image_id = 5;
